channel.title: Server
channel.description:
[u][b]My server is Running correctly. (Gnarly Scape)
My server is Running on port 43594.[/b][/u]
But yet when i try to log onto it from silab's client or Moparscape, it says:
[code]Error Connecting to server. Must be down.[/code]

item.title: Server
item.dc:creator: @life-scape life-scape
item.description:
@life-scape wrote:

[u][b]THE SERVER IS RUNNING

THE SERVER IS RUNNING ON PORT 43594

I FOLLOWED THE ADVICE ABOVE!!!

IT STILL IS NOT WORKING[/b][/u]

Read full topic

item.title: Server
item.dc:creator: @Dell Dell
item.description:
@Dell wrote:

silly you shouldnt be talking…

life, have you made a no-ip and etc.
and i dont think making another user is what he means when you port foward…and i dont think you need to port foward to get on your own server just to make it online for other users…

but ya if its running fine just click your .run.bat leave it on and then log in with this ip: 127.0.0.1 : or : o.o.o.o : or : 1.2.3.4 <—works for me

Read full topic

item.description:
@bryanc wrote:

[quote=“silly_faggit, post:4, topic:169241”]Server must be down!!! LMFAO…

That means you need to run your server first buddy ;D[/quote]

Don’t think your cool and people will like you. On the same page in the development section, you have a thread JUST like this. So SDFU

Reboot your pc, and open run.bat not compile.bat
